org.arl.fjage.shell

Class OutputShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.shell.OutputShell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shell

    public class OutputShell
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shell
    Output only shell, used for displaying messages.
